text: Mauro Corsi (1595–1680) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of San Miniato (1662–1680). (in Latin) ==Biography== Mauro Corsi was born in Pecciolo, Italy on 10 Mar 1595 and ordained a priest on 23 Mar 1619. On 31 Jul 1662, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Alexander VII as Bishop of San Miniato. He served as Bishop of San Miniato until his death on 30 Dec 1680. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Alexander VII Category:1595 births Category:1680 deaths
title: Mauro Corsi
